short_summary: Acquisition of an anti-flooding device for the protection of buildings at the Canadian Coast Guard Quebec Base.
description: The Canadian Public Works and Government Services, on behalf of the Department of Fisheries and Oceans, invites proposals to secure the acquisition of an anti-flooding device for the protection of buildings at the Canadian Coast Guard Quebec Base, as detailed in Annex A of the bid.
tags: Requires a secure login to view full details
full_summary:
# Request for Proposal (RFP) for Anti-Flooding Device

**RFP Title**: F3766-230677
**English Title**: RFP for Anti-Flooding Device for the Protection of Buildings at the Quebec Base
**French Title**: Demande de Proposition (DDP) pour le dispositif anti-inondation pour la protection des bâtiments de la Base de Québec

**Reference Number**: WS4326630801-Doc4326654525
**Amendment Number**: 6

## Solicitation Information
* **Publication Date**: 2023-12-07
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-01-24T14:00:00
* **Amendment Date**: 2024-01-19
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2024-01-31
* **Expected Contract End Date**: 2025-03-31

## Summary and Objectives
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) to acquire an anti-flooding device for the protection of buildings at the Canadian Coast Guard Quebec Base. The selected supplier will be responsible for delivering, installing, and training the end user on the device, as detailed in the Annex A.

## Procurement Details
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Trade Agreements**: Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), and Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* **Regions of Delivery**: Quebec

## Contracting Entity and End User
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End User**: Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) / Canadian Coast Guard (CCG)
* **End User Address**: 200 Kent Street, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0E6, Canada / 200 Kent St. Station 13E228, Ottawa, Ontario K1A0E6, Canada

## Contact Information
* **Contact Name**: Piras, Gabriel (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Contact Email**: gabriel.piras@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
